weapons.name: Alley Hunter
weapons.passiveDesc: Every 4s a character is on the field, their ATK increases by 4/5/6/7/8% and their CRIT DMG increases by 4/5/6/7/8%. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be cleared when the character takes DMG.

weapons.name: Amber Catalyst
weapons.passiveDesc: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 6/7.5/9/10.5/12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

weapons.name: Amos' Bow
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 12/15/18/21/24%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 8/10/12/14/16% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s. Stacks up to 5 times on each arrow.

weapons.name: Aquila Favonia
weapons.passiveDesc: ATK is increased by 20/25/30/35/40%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100/115/130/145/160% of ATK and dealing 200/230/260/290/320% of ATK as DMG to surrounding enemies. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

weapons.name: Black Tassel
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases DMG against slimes by 40/50/60/70/80%.

weapons.name: Blackcliff Amulet
weapons.passiveDesc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12/15/18/21/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.name: Blackcliff Longsword
weapons.passiveDesc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12/15/18/21/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.name: Blackcliff Pole
weapons.passiveDesc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12/15/18/21/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.name: Blackcliff Slasher
weapons.passiveDesc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12/15/18/21/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.name: Blackcliff Warbow
weapons.passiveDesc: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12/15/18/21/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 12/15/18/21/24%.

weapons.name: Compound Bow
weapons.passiveDesc: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 4/5/6/7/8% and Normal Attack SPD by 1.2/1.5/1.8/2.1/2.4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

weapons.name: Cool Steel
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12/15/18/21/24%.

weapons.name: Crescent Pike
weapons.passiveDesc: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 20% ATK as DMG for 5s.

weapons.name: Dark Iron Sword
weapons.passiveDesc: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20/25/30/35/40% for 12s.

weapons.name: Deathmatch
weapons.passiveDesc: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 16% and DEF is increased by 16%. If there are less than 2 enemies nearby, ATK is increased by 24%.

weapons.name: Debate Club
weapons.passiveDesc: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 60/75/90/105/120% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

weapons.name: Dragon's Bane
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20/24/28/32/36%.

weapons.name: Dragonspine Spear
weapons.passiveDesc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Ebony Bow
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin enemies by 40/50/60/70/80%.

weapons.name: Emerald Orb
weapons.passiveDesc: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20/25/30/35/40% for 12s.

weapons.name: Eye of Perception
weapons.passiveDesc: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240/270/300/330/360% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12/11/10/9/8s.

weapons.name: Favonius Codex
weapons.passiveDesc: CRIT hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12/10.5/9/7.5/6s.

weapons.name: Favonius Greatsword
weapons.passiveDesc: CRIT hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12/10.5/9/7.5/6s.

weapons.name: Favonius Lance
weapons.passiveDesc: CRIT hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12/10.5/9/7.5/6s.

weapons.name: Favonius Sword
weapons.passiveDesc: CRIT hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12/10.5/9/7.5/6s.

weapons.name: Favonius Warbow
weapons.passiveDesc: CRIT hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12/10.5/9/7.5/6s.

weapons.name: Ferrous Shadow
weapons.passiveDesc: When HP falls below 70/75/80/85/90%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30/35/40/45/50%, and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.

weapons.name: Festering Desire
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16/20/24/28/32% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6/7.5/9/10.5/12%.

weapons.name: Fillet Blade
weapons.passiveDesc: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 240/280/320/360/400% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 15/14/13/12/11s.

weapons.name: Frostbearer
weapons.passiveDesc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Halberd
weapons.passiveDesc: Normal Attacks deal an additional 160/200/240/280/320% DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Harbinger of Dawn
weapons.passiveDesc: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14/18/22/24/28%.

weapons.name: Iron Sting
weapons.passiveDesc: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

weapons.name: Kunwu's Iris Rift
weapons.passiveDesc: Normal Attack hits have a 20% chance of causing the next Charged Attack performed in the following 10s to deal 40% increased DMG.

weapons.name: Lion's Roar
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 20/24/28/32/36%.

weapons.name: Lithic Blade
weapons.passiveDesc: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 6/7/8/9/10% ATK increase and 2/3/4/5/6% CRIT Rate increase.

weapons.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, earn a 6/8/10/12/14% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

weapons.name: Magic Guide
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 12/15/18/21/24%.

weapons.name: Mappa Mare
weapons.passiveDesc: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 8/10/12/14/16% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

weapons.name: Memory of Dust
weapons.passiveDesc: Increase Shield Strength by 20/25/30/35/40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4/5/6/7/8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.name: Messenger
weapons.passiveDesc: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 100/125/150/175/200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Otherworldly Story
weapons.passiveDesc: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2% HP.

weapons.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
weapons.passiveDesc: On hit, increases ATK by 3.2/3.9/4.6/5.3/6% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. Full stacks increase Skill DMG by 12/16/20/24/28%.

weapons.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
weapons.passiveDesc: HP increased by 20~40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.2~2.4% of the wielder's Max HP.

weapons.name: Prototype Aminus
weapons.passiveDesc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240/300/360/420/480% ATK DMG to enemies within a small radius. Can only occur once every 15s.

weapons.name: Prototype Crescent
weapons.passiveDesc: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 6% for 10s.

weapons.name: Prototype Grudge
weapons.passiveDesc: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

weapons.name: Prototype Malice
weapons.passiveDesc: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4/4.5/5/5.5/6 Energy every 2s for 6s. Additionally, all party members will regenerate 4/4.5/5/5.5/6% HP every 2s for this duration.

weapons.name: Prototype Rancour
weapons.passiveDesc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 4/4.5/5/5.5/6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

weapons.name: Quartz
weapons.passiveDesc: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20/25/30/35/40% for 12s.

weapons.name: Rainslasher
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 20/25/30/35/40%.

weapons.name: Raven Bow
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 12/15/18/21/24%.

weapons.name: Recurve Bow
weapons.passiveDesc: Defeating an opponent restores 8/10/12/14/16% HP.

weapons.name: Royal Bow
weapons.passiveDesc: Upon damaging an enemy, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

weapons.name: Royal Greatsword
weapons.passiveDesc: Upon damaging an enemy, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

weapons.name: Royal Grimoire
weapons.passiveDesc: Upon damaging an enemy, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

weapons.name: Royal Longsword
weapons.passiveDesc: Upon damaging an enemy, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

weapons.name: Rust
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40/50/60/70/80% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 8/9/10/11/12%

weapons.name: Sacrificial Bow
weapons.passiveDesc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40/50/60/70/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30/26/22/18/14s.

weapons.name: Sacrificial Fragments
weapons.passiveDesc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40/50/60/70/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30/26/22/18/14s.

weapons.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
weapons.passiveDesc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40/50/60/70/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30/26/22/18/14s.

weapons.name: Sacrificial Sword
weapons.passiveDesc: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40/50/60/70/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30/26/22/18/14s.

weapons.name: Serpent Spine
weapons.passiveDesc: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6% more DMG and take 3% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be cleared when the character takes DMG.

weapons.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases DMG against weak spots by 24/30/36/42/48%.

weapons.name: Skyrider Greatsword
weapons.passiveDesc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6/7/8/9/10% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.

weapons.name: Skyrider Sword
weapons.passiveDesc: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12/15/18/21/24% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.

weapons.name: Skyward Atlas
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 12/15/18/21/24%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 160/200/240/280/320% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

weapons.name: Skyward Blade
weapons.passiveDesc:
CRIT Rate increased by 4%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst:
Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and increases the DMG of Normal and Charged Attack hits by 20% for 12s.

weapons.name: Skyward Harp
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases CRIT DMG by 20/25/30/35/40%. Hits have a 60/70/80/90/100% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 100% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4s.

weapons.name: Skyward Pride
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases all DMG by 8/10/12/14/16%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 80/100/120/140/160% Physical DMG to enemies along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

weapons.name: Skyward Spine
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases CRIT Rate by 8% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on enemies have a 50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals 40% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

weapons.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
weapons.passiveDesc: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Solar Pearl
weapons.passiveDesc: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20/25/30/35/40% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20/25/30/35/40% for 6s.

weapons.name: Summit Shaper
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases Shield Strength by 20/25/30/35/40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4/5/6/7/8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.name: The Alley Flash
weapons.passiveDesc: Continuosly sprinting for at least 1s increases ATK by 28% for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

weapons.name: The Bell
weapons.passiveDesc: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 20/23/26/29/32% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by the shield, the character gains 12/15/18/21/24% increased DMG.

weapons.name: The Black Sword
weapons.passiveDesc:
Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20%.
Additionally, regenerates 60% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

weapons.name: The Flute
weapons.passiveDesc: Normal or Charged Attacks grant Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100/125/150/175/200% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

weapons.name: The Stringless
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24/30/36/42/48%.

weapons.name: The Viridescent Hunt
weapons.passiveDesc: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding enemies, dealing 40% of ATK as DMG to these enemies every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 14s.

weapons.name: The Widsith
weapons.passiveDesc:
When the character takes the field, they gain a random theme song for 10s:
Recitative: Increases Base ATK by 60%
Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240
Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48%
Can only occur once every 30s

weapons.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
weapons.passiveDesc: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 24/30/36/42/48% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

weapons.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
weapons.passiveDesc: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2% HP.

weapons.name: Twin Nephrite
weapons.passiveDesc: Defeating an enemy increases Movement SPD and ATK by 12/14/16/18/20% for 15s.

weapons.name: White Iron Greatsword
weapons.passiveDesc: Defeating an opponent restores 8/10/12/14/16% HP.

weapons.name: White Tassel
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 24/30/36/42/48%.

weapons.name: Whiteblind
weapons.passiveDesc: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and DEF by 6/7.5/9/10.5/12% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.

weapons.name: Wine and Song
weapons.passiveDesc: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 8/10/12/14/16% ATK increase and 3/3.5/4/4.5/5% Movement SPD increase.

weapons.name: Wolf's Gravestone
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases Base ATK by 20/25/30/35/40%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 40/50/60/70/80% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

weapons.name: Staff of Homa
weapons.passiveDesc: HP increased by 20~40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 0.8~1.6% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK bonus is increased by an additional 1~1.8% of Max HP.

weapons.name: Vortex Vanquisher
weapons.passiveDesc: Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.
